title: How Gaming, Loyalty and Entertainment Are Adapting to the Rise of NFTs and Web3
description: The gaming, entertainment and loyalty industries are poised for big changes, thanks to Web3 tech such as NFTs and DAOs. We talk to the experts on how.  Plus, Nike and Puma announced new digital partnerships that show Web3 is still kicking.

title: Binance US Restores USD Withdrawals, Suggests Users Withdraw or Spend Their Dollars
description: The U.S. subsidiary of the world’s largest crypto exchange, Binance, announced it has resolved the issues with U.S. dollar (USD) withdrawals. The trading platform, which recently averted an asset freeze sought by the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), informed customers, however, that withdrawal services are likely to be discontinued again. Binance US May […]

title: Binance just got kicked out of Belgium
description: Crypto titan Binance has been given a cease-and-desist order by the Belgian Financial Services and Markets Authority (FSMA). Belgium’s leading financial watchdog has taken action, stating that Binance has been offering and executing exchanges between digital and fiat currencies and providing custody wallet services, all while operating from countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). ... Read more

title: Key takeaways from the U.S. June PMI report
description: The U.S. June Purchasing Managers’ Index (PMI) reveals a mixed economic scenario. While the services sector continues its strong run, manufacturing faces a dip. title: SEC greenlights first leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF in the US
description: The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has approved the Volatility Shares 2x Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITX), marking the debut of the first leveraged Bitcoin futures ETF in the country​. This decision comes at a pivotal time as Bitcoin’s value recently surpassed the $31,000 milestone, a surge likely buoyed by major traditional investment companies ... Read more

title: Crypto finds stronghold in underdeveloped African countries
description: In a fascinating financial twist, cryptocurrency, once perceived as the domain of wealthy nations and high-income individuals, is increasingly finding a home in Africa’s underprivileged nations. Africa’s engagement with digital assets is escalating, despite the global market’s recent downturn and the stumbling of crypto giant FTX. title: Elite Markets Interested in Crypto, Digital Assets Will Survive: Analyst
description:
